attributes.action: call a general election NOW to enable removal of this incompetent Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is enough. The people of Britain want a General Election NOW to enable removal of this present incompetent Government. Too many mistakes  and errors of judgement have been made. Too many to list here and far too many to allow the present Government to run this country any longer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
